segments.text: Oh , no . It looks like we're late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's just sit in the back . We can still hear the service from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There're so many people here . Where are Rich and Cath and Taylor's parents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're probably up front . The preacher's about to speak . Let's listen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was such a touching speech . He must have really known Taylor well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , how I wish this all wasn't happening !
segments.speaker: S2
